tool.name: ConcoordDist
tool.description: : Wrapper of the Dist tool from the Concoord package.

param.name: outname_output_dat_path
param.label: output DAT,TXT name
param.help: Output dat with structure interpretation and bond definitions Format: [output].[format]

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: Concoord dist binary path to be used.

param.name: vdw
param.label: vdw
param.help: Select a set of Van der Waals parameters.
param.option: 6 - OPLS-X parameters -recommended for NMR structure determination-

param.name: bond_angle
param.label: bond_angle
param.help: Select a set of bond/angle parameters.

param.name: nb_interactions
param.label: nb_interactions
param.help: Try to find alternatives for non-bonded interactions (by default the native contacts will be preserved)

param.name: cutoff
param.label: cutoff
param.help: cut-off radius (Angstroms) for non-bonded interacting pairs (the cut-off distances are additional to the sum of VDW radii)

param.name: min_distances
param.label: min_distances
param.help: Minimum number of distances to be defined for each atom

param.name: damp
param.label: damp
param.help: Multiply each distance margin by this value

param.name: fixed_atoms
param.label: fixed_atoms
param.help: Interpret zero occupancy as atoms to keep fixed
